name: Dinner Tonight: Cool Summer Gazpacho
description: I love flipping through people's old recipe clippings—the yellowed curling newspaper scraps with fading print and faint notes in pencil, collected in folders, pressed between sheets of plastic, or just thrown in a box. The recipes are the beloved, tried-and-true...
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups chopped red or green pepper

recipeInstructions.text: In large bowl, combine all ingredients. If desired, purée. Cover and chill for at least 30 minutes, preferably a few hours.
